content.question: Which of the following statements must be true about the series <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity of, a, sub n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> with positive terms if <math alttext="the limit as n approaches infinity, of, the fraction with numerator a, sub n plus 1, end subscript, and denominator a, sub n, end fraction, equals L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The series converges if <math alttext="L equals one half" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The series converges if <math alttext="L equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The series converges if <math alttext="L equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The series converges if <math alttext="L equals infinity" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The series converges if <math alttext="L equals one half" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.
